document.full_text: the killing of osama bin laden by u.s. forces was welcomed on monday by the western-backed palestinian authority while its prospective power-sharing partner, islamist hamas, deplored his death.
document.title: abbas government welcomes bin laden death, hamas deplores
lines_and_colors: the killing of osama bin laden by u.s. forces was welcomed on monday by the western-backed palestinian authority while its prospective power-sharing partner, islamist hamas, deplored his death.
